name: Little Birds In Clouds Jersey Lounge Trousers
description:
Fantastically comfy, easy on, easy off, super soft jersey lounge trousers. Made from gorgeous organic pink birds in clouds fabric, with contrasting bright pink waistband and ankle cuffs. 

 The waistband and ankle cuffs are extra wide and can be worn either unfolded, or folded, which means these trousers could fit for well over a year! 

 Each pair is handmade in Somerset, U.K, by mummy to four and lover of all things Scandinavian, Izzy.

name: Mr. Fox Embroidery Hoop Wall Art Pair
description:
How can you not love foxes when they look like this! A perfect addition to any fox lovers home or office, place either side of a chimney breast, doorway, mirror or side by side on a feature wall. 

 A set of two 10" embroidery hoops, one featuring Mr. Fox's nose, ears and front legs, the second featuring Mr. Fox's back legs and tail, the tip pokes neatly out of the edge of the frame for a quirky detail. 

 The backs are finished with a dark red ric rac attached to hide and secure the edges of the fabric. 

 These fox hoops were designed and are handmade in Somerset, U.K. by mummy to four and lover of all things Scandinavian, Izzy.

name: Dala Horse & Pink Stars Jersey Twirly Dress
description:
These little dresses are just delightful. In a wonderfully comfortable and stylish style, cut to just below the knee with a bit of extra fabric to make them perfect for twirling in! 

 The two fabrics are both organic jerseys and are super soft and stretchy. Detailed with a contrasting neckline and matching chest pocket for keeping important tiny things. 

 Each dress is handmade in Somerset, U.K, by mummy to four and lover of all things Scandinavian, Izzy.

name: Woodland Animals Jersey Dungarees
description:
These dungarees are made from the cutest animal print jersey, mint green with pink elephants, foxes, bears and owls, all the favourites! 

 Detailed with a contrasting pink and white spot fabric lining, ankle cuffs, moon shaped pocket and star appliqu√© on the bottom. Finished by hand, each pair is unique with mis matched buttons.

 Each pair of dungarees are handmade in Somerset, U.K. by mummy to four and lover of all things Scandinavian, Izzy.

name: Little Viking Jersey Dungarees
description:
These little dungarees are made from a gorgeously soft organic jersey fabric covered in tiny Vikings, longboats, campfires and more. 

 Detailed with a star patch on the bottom, moon shaped pocket on the front, ankle cuffs and mis match buttons. The body is lined in the same contrasting fabric and each pair is unique! 

 Handmade in Somerset, U.K, by mummy to four and lover of all things Scandinavian, Izzy. A lot of time and care is taken over each and every product and these dungarees are finished by hand.

 These dungarees can be made in any age from 0 - 10 years and a different lining and detail fabric can be used.
